verses.text: \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* one \w year|strong="H1121"\w*; and when he had \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,\f + \fr 13.1 \ft reigned one…: Heb. the son of one year in his reigning\f*

\w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w chose|strong="H0977"\w* him \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \add men\add* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \add whereof\add* two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* were with \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* in \w Michmash|strong="H4363"\w* and in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, and a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* were with \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* in \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*: and the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*.

And \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w garrison|strong="H5333"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* that \add was\add* in \w Geba|strong="H1387"\w*, and the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add of it\add*. And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w blew|strong="H8628"\w* the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* throughout all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Let the \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*.\f + \fr 13.3 \ft Geba: or, the hill\f*

And all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \add that\add* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* had \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* a \w garrison|strong="H5333"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and \add that\add* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* also was had in \w abomination|strong="H0887"\w* with the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*. And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* were called \w together|strong="H6817"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* to \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*.\f + \fr 13.4 \ft was…: Heb. did stink\f*

¶ And the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* gathered themselves \w together|strong="H0622"\w* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* with \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, and \w people|strong="H5971"\w* as the \w sand|strong="H2344"\w* which \add is\add* on the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w shore|strong="H8193"\w* in \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w*: and they came \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* in \w Michmash|strong="H4363"\w*, \w eastward|strong="H6926"\w* from \w Beth-aven|strong="H1007"\w*.

When the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that they were in a \w strait|strong="H6887"\w*, (for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* were \w distressed|strong="H5065"\w*,) then the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* did \w hide|strong="H2244"\w* themselves in \w caves|strong="H4631"\w*, and in \w thickets|strong="H2337"\w*, and in \w rocks|strong="H5553"\w*, and in high \w places|strong="H6877"\w*, and in \w pits|strong="H0953"\w*.

And \add some of\add* the \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w* went \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* to the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* and \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*. As for \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, he \add was\add* yet in \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* him \w trembling|strong="H2729"\w*.\f + \fr 13.7 \ft followed…: Heb. trembled after him\f*

¶ And he \w tarried|strong="H3176"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, according to the set \w time|strong="H4150"\w* that \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \add had appointed:\add* but \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* not to \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*; and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* were \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w* from him.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Bring \w hither|strong="H5066"\w* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* to me, and peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*. And he \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.

And it came to pass, that as soon as he had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w offering|strong="H5927"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, behold, \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*; and \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* him, that he might \w salute|strong="H1288"\w* him.\f + \fr 13.10 \ft salute: Heb. bless\f*

¶ And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What hast thou \w done|strong="H6213"\w*? And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Because I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* were \w scattered|strong="H5310"\w* from me, and \add that\add* thou \w camest|strong="H0935"\w* not within the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w*, and \add that\add* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* gathered themselves \w together|strong="H0622"\w* at \w Michmash|strong="H4363"\w*;

Therefore \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I, The \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* will come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* now upon me to \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*, and I have not made \w supplication|strong="H2470"\w* \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: I \w forced|strong="H0662"\w* myself therefore, and \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.\f + \fr 13.12 \ft made…: Heb. intreated the face\f*

And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, Thou hast done \w foolishly|strong="H5528"\w*: thou hast not \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which he \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee: for now would the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* have \w established|strong="H3559"\w* thy \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* upon \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

But now thy \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* shall not \w continue|strong="H6965"\w*: the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* him a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* after his own \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* him \add to be\add* \w captain|strong="H5057"\w* over his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, because thou hast not \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \add that\add* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee.

And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and gat him \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w* unto \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*. And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add that were\add* \w present|strong="H4672"\w* with him, about \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.\f + \fr 13.15 \ft present: Heb. found\f*

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add that were\add* \w present|strong="H4672"\w* with them, \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Gibeah|strong="H1387"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*: but the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* in \w Michmash|strong="H4363"\w*.\f + \fr 13.16 \ft present: Heb. found\f*\f + \fr 13.16 \ft Gibeah: Heb. Geba\f*

¶ And the \w spoilers|strong="H7843"\w* came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* in \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w companies|strong="H7218"\w*: \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w company|strong="H7218"\w* \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* unto the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \add that leadeth to\add* \w Ophrah|strong="H6084"\w*, unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Shual|strong="H7777"\w*:

And \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w company|strong="H7218"\w* \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \add to\add* \w Beth-horon|strong="H1032"\w*: and \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w company|strong="H7218"\w* \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* \add to\add* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* that \w looketh|strong="H8259"\w* to the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of \w Zeboim|strong="H6650"\w* toward the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

¶ Now there was no \w smith|strong="H2796"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* throughout all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: for the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Lest the \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \add them\add* \w swords|strong="H2719"\w* or \w spears|strong="H2595"\w*:

But all the \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, to \w sharpen|strong="H3913"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w share|strong="H4282"\w*, and his \w coulter|strong="H0855"\w*, and his \w axe|strong="H7134"\w*, and his \w mattock|strong="H4281"\w*.

Yet they had a \w file|strong="H6477"\w* for the \w mattocks|strong="H4281"\w*, and for the \w coulters|strong="H0855"\w*, and for the \w forks|strong="H7969"\w*, and for the \w axes|strong="H7134"\w*, and to \w sharpen|strong="H5324"\w* the \w goads|strong="H1861"\w*.\f + \fr 13.21 \ft a file: Heb. a file with mouths, or Heb. a pim, a third of a shekel\f*\f + \fr 13.21 \ft sharpen: Heb. set\f*

So it came to pass in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, that there was neither \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* nor \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of any of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* with \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w*: but with \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and with \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* was there \w found|strong="H4672"\w*.

And the \w garrison|strong="H4673"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to the \w passage|strong="H4569"\w* of \w Michmash|strong="H4363"\w*.\f + \fr 13.23 \ft garrison: or, standing camp\f*
